segments.text: There's a subtle tension in the air, I can feel it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman continues her dish-drying, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the water is steadily spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a small flood that will only get worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the children's cookie raid is happening simultaneously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's moments away from collapsing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the crash and splash before it happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's frustrating to watch this unfold without intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why doesn't anyone notice the obvious dangers?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation feels like a ticking time bomb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout out a warning to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I am only an observer here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for accidents is so high right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
